name: eve-mcp
description: EVE MCP Server - Academic PDF Search and Q&A Service
author: EVE Development Team

tools.name: search_papers
tools.description: Search for academic papers on various sites

inputs.name: site
inputs.description: Target site to search (arxiv, scholar, pubmed)

inputs.name: max_results
inputs.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: download_pdf
tools.description: Download and extract text from a PDF document

inputs.name: url
inputs.description: URL of the PDF to download

tools.name: ask_about_pdf
tools.description: Ask questions about a downloaded PDF document

inputs.name: pdf_identifier
inputs.description: URL or filename of the PDF. If omitted, uses the most recent PDF

inputs.name: question
inputs.description: Question to ask about the PDF content

tools.name: list_downloaded_pdfs
tools.description: List all downloaded PDFs with their titles and filenames
